ygData.subject: Screaming mace 4 U
ygData.msgSnippet: I am not sure but at level 21 I think I am one of the higher levels on this list but I was hoping someone could help me.  I am looking to find/buy/trade for a
ygData.messageBody:
I am not sure but at level 21 I think I am one of the higher levels
on this list but I was hoping someone could help me. I am looking to
find/buy/trade for a travelers pack or any pack that will reduce the weight
of carried goods. I find I am carrying about 20 lbs of usful stuff wich is
all great but really hurts my ability to bring back good loot.

Wanted:
Travelers pack or equivelent
Magic Boots
Bloodstained armor
Ebony blade (yea right! hehe)
Player made packs (will pay 15 plat for each .. I want 10)

I am also looking for good magic ranger armor and some player made
back packs.

For trade I have
2 screaming maces, 8 damage 35 delay casts yalp (Magic)
2 Shiny Brass shields 10 AC +10 Magic Resistance
1 Brass Idol 1 charge of divine aura (temperary invulnerability)
Many words for spell research
1 small mountain of banded armor (I am a Master smith)
An Oak Bow (I will be a Master fletcher soon) BTW these babies cost
over 80 plat for each atempt ACK!


I will also be willing to sell thes for a reasonable offer but I
really want to trade for other magic items.

Dulsin Farstrider Ranger of Tunare
